name: delivery-link
description: This is a workshop project that uses Chainlink to implement payment-on-delivery.

scripts.start: npm stop ; npm run truffle:migrate-ganache && npm run chainlink:start && npm run truffle:init-setup
scripts.truffle:add-jobs: cd ./truffle && npx truffle exec ./scripts/add-jobs.js --network ganache && cd ..
scripts.truffle:fund-dlink: cd ./truffle && npx truffle exec ./scripts/fund-dlink.js --network ganache && cd ..
scripts.truffle:init-setup: npm run truffle:fund-dlink && npm run truffle:prep-node && npm run truffle:add-jobs
scripts.truffle:migrate-ganache: cd ./truffle/ && npx truffle migrate --network ganache && cd ..
scripts.truffle:prep-node: cd ./truffle && npx truffle exec ./scripts/prep-node.js --network ganache && cd ..

author: Dan Forbes <dan@danforbes.dev>
